【學生校董選情告急 只有6.8%投票率】
【PolyU Council Student Rep Campaign urges for voters, only 6.8% voted on day 1】

根據選舉委員會的最新通知，第一日的校董會選舉只有6.8%的理大同學投票，與10%之法定門檻有一定的距離。本會在此呼籲同學參與是次的投票選舉，以一人一票的方式表達，學生對校方施政的不滿。

注意：非學生會會員亦能投票，同學需打開Outlook，尋找圖二的電郵（星期六或日），按下連結，就能進行投票。

According to the Election Officer, there were only 6.8% PolyU students voted for the PolyU Council Student Representative (SR), which at least 10% is needed in order to reach the quorum. The Union hereby urges all PolyU students to vote for the council SR, to express dissatisfaction on the schools recent policies.

Note: Non-SU members can vote too, students only need to open outlook, look for the email in the second picture (it was sent between last Saturday and Sunday), click the link and you will be directed to the vote page

replies.msg:
"PolyU FinTech 課程真心好有問題

1. 課程設計缺乏溝通 教學雙方難以並行
根本大部分comp 嘅professor對FinTech 學生嘅能力都一無所知，到頭來教同學雙方都十分困難。直到今時今日，好多professor 都以為data structure、AMA同埋javascript呢啲comp學生嘅基本知識人人都有，其實一眾business底嘅學生根本就對呢啲一無所知。負責呢個program嘅人係設計課程嘅時候不但無對學生嘅背景有足夠嘅了解，更加無知會其他老師相關嘅情況，就將課程倉卒推出。最後一班professor同學生只好係教與學上都見步行步。professor講極學生都唔明，學生聽黎聽去都係得舊雲，而一班高層就淨係識得叫學生唔好咁短視，要睇多啲書，唔識就Google同百度下。但有無諗過有啲科目唔係靠睇書Google就可以明，如果咁易你都唔洗教啦。

2. 課程內容貨不對版 欺騙學生敷衍了事
當初叫人讀科嘅時候就話Finance同Technology嘅科目各佔一半，希望學生可以學得全面啲。但作為一個business底嘅學生，讀左三個sem十幾科得一科business finance係關business事。更甚係原來推銷嘅時候所提及嘅過百間初創企業，比到學生大量實習機會，可以去到Microsoft呢啲通通都係空頭支票。到頭來，提供到嘅實習一係就全部都要寫code唔收business底嘅人，一係就人地根本唔請人。最後所謂Top10成績嘅學生都只不過係證券行碎紙。試問呢種貨不對版合理唔合理？

好坦白講，今日我地唔係要任何人出黎做箭靶。但個課程搞到咁嘅地步，咁多學生都怨聲載道嘅時候，課程嘅負責人係咪都應該出黎回應下學生嘅問題，執返好個手尾。而唔係將個責任推比其他人，好似單嘢唔係佢跟開咁。"

之前睇到，唔知真假

根本大部分comp 嘅professor對FinTech 學生嘅能力都一無所知，到頭來教同學雙方都十分困難。直到今時今日，好多professor 都以為data structure、AMA同埋javascript呢啲comp學生嘅基本知識人人都有，其實一眾business底嘅學生根本就對呢啲一無所知。負責呢個program嘅人係設計課程嘅時候不但無對學生嘅背景有足夠嘅了解，更加無知會其他老師相關嘅情況，就將課程倉卒推出。最後一班professor同學生只好係教與學上都見步行步。professor講極學生都唔明，學生聽黎聽去都係得舊雲，而一班高層就淨係識得叫學生唔好咁短視，要睇多啲書，唔識就Google同百度下。但有無諗過有啲科目唔係靠睇書Google就可以明，如果咁易你都唔洗教啦。

2. 課程內容貨不對版 欺騙學生敷衍了事
當初叫人讀科嘅時候就話Finance同Technology嘅科目各佔一半，希望學生可以學得全面啲。但作為一個business底嘅學生，讀左三個sem十幾科得一科business finance係關business事。更甚係原來推銷嘅時候所提及嘅過百間初創企業，比到學生大量實習機會，可以去到Microsoft呢啲通通都係空頭支票。到頭來，提供到嘅實習一係就全部都要寫code唔收business底嘅人，一係就人地根本唔請人。最後所謂Top10成績嘅學生都只不過係證券行碎紙。試問呢種貨不對版合理唔合理？

好坦白講，今日我地唔係要任何人出黎做箭靶。但個課程搞到咁嘅地步，咁多學生都怨聲載道嘅時候，課程嘅負責人係咪都應該出黎回應下學生嘅問題，執返好個手尾。而唔係將個責任推比其他人，好似單嘢唔係佢跟開咁。"

replies.msg:
To : All CEE HD and UG Students



Dear Students,



The Department has received enquiries on the mode of examination (i.e. Take-home exam vs in-hall exam) and the grading arrangement for this semester. I have taken the chance to meet with representatives of CEE Students Society this morning to clarify the issues, and would like to provide the below for your information.



Mode of examination (i.e. Take-home exam vs in-hall exam)



In deciding the mode of examination, the Department has considered the subject nature (i.e. whether it is literature/theoretical-based or mathematical-based). If the subject contains 50% or over mathematics component, then in-hall exam would be adopted.



Hence, for subjects in EOSH curriculum, most of the examinations will be in the mode of take-home exam since the subjects are mainly based on literature review, safety rules/policy and theories. There are less mathematics component.



For subjects in HD Civil, Civil, EESD, SFSE curricula, most of the examinations will be in the mode of in-hall exam as mathematics and its application in buildings and related infrastructures are the basic know-how for a civil/environmental/fire safety engineer. Since calculation is objective and involve step-by-step arithmetic process, in-hall exam is therefore the most fair mode to test students’ ability.



Grading arrangement



In Semester 2 of 2019/20, the University has decided that a student can opt for at most 6 credits among those subjects that provide a change from Letter to Pass/Fail grading.



In the view that Pass/Fail option has been adopted for semester 1 2019/20 and that our programmes are accredited by professional bodies, we have written to the accreditation bodies and obtained the below feedback.



For EOSH programme - Advice from Labour Department (LD) in December 2019



The Labour Department (LD) is of the view that the option for the “Pass/Fail” instead of having the letter grades involve a change to the assessment methods as stated in the Definitive Programme Document and may cause the assessment of progressing status not feasible. According to “Guidance Notes on the Application for Recognition of Academic Qualification for the purpose of Registration as a Safety Officer under the Factories and Industrial Undertakings (Safety Officers and Safety Supervisors) Regulations”, any non-conformance to the recognized course proposal/programme may lead to the withdrawal of recognition for the purpose of registration as safety officers by the LD.



With the above advice from LD, the Department has decided that letter grades should apply to all subjects under the EOSH curriculum.



For HD Civil, Civil, EESD and SFSE programmes – Advice from The Hong Kong Institution of Engineers (HKIE) in November 2019

The HKIE has drawn Department’s attention on the possible impact of Pass/Fail grading on the measurement of programme outcomes. According to the HKIE, if the subject concerned is being used to measure the achievement of programme outcome(s), this simple pass/fail assessment result may not meet the internal standard and benchmark (e.g. 70% students achieving Grade C or above) which facilitate the demonstration of the achievement of programme outcomes.

Hence, to safeguard our students’ interests and to ensure that our programmes will be accredited by HKIE, the Department has decided that letter grades should apply to all core subjects (including elective DSR subjects) under the HD Civil, Civil, EESD and SFSE curricula.



Hope the above clarify your concern. Please stay healthy and wish you good luck in the exams.



If you have further question, please feel free to email me at chi-sun.poon@polyu.edu.hk.



Regards

CS P

Chi Sun Poon, PhD, FHKIE, JP

Chair Professor of Sustainable Construction Materials

Head

Dept of Civil and Environmental Engineering

The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

Hung Hom, Hong Kong

"PolyU FinTech 課程真心好有問題

1. 課程設計缺乏溝通 教學雙方難以並行
根本大部分comp 嘅professor對FinTech 學生嘅能力都一無所知，到頭來教同學雙方都十分困難。直到今時今日，好多professor 都以為data structure、AMA同埋javascript呢啲comp學生嘅基本知識人人都有，其實一眾business底嘅學生根本就對呢啲一無所知。負責呢個program嘅人係設計課程嘅時候不但無對學生嘅背景有足夠嘅了解，更加無知會其他老師相關嘅情況，就將課程倉卒推出。最後一班professor同學生只好係教與學上都見步行步。professor講極學生都唔明，學生聽黎聽去都係得舊雲，而一班高層就淨係識得叫學生唔好咁短視，要睇多啲書，唔識就Google同百度下。但有無諗過有啲科目唔係靠睇書Google就可以明，如果咁易你都唔洗教啦。

2. 課程內容貨不對版 欺騙學生敷衍了事
當初叫人讀科嘅時候就話Finance同Technology嘅科目各佔一半，希望學生可以學得全面啲。但作為一個business底嘅學生，讀左三個sem十幾科得一科business finance係關business事。更甚係原來推銷嘅時候所提及嘅過百間初創企業，比到學生大量實習機會，可以去到Microsoft呢啲通通都係空頭支票。到頭來，提供到嘅實習一係就全部都要寫code唔收business底嘅人，一係就人地根本唔請人。最後所謂Top10成績嘅學生都只不過係證券行碎紙。試問呢種貨不對版合理唔合理？

好坦白講，今日我地唔係要任何人出黎做箭靶。但個課程搞到咁嘅地步，咁多學生都怨聲載道嘅時候，課程嘅負責人係咪都應該出黎回應下學生嘅問題，執返好個手尾。而唔係將個責任推比其他人，好似單嘢唔係佢跟開咁。"

之前睇到，唔知真假
